about_the_game:
Void Stealer is a hardcore single player bodycam extraction shooter with experimental 144 FPS mode, horror atmosphere and survival elements in dangerous open world where the death of your character means a complete loss of progress.

Explore the terrifying Cluster - an abandoned restricted area devastated by a mysterious Delta radiation, whose secrets are guarded by hostile military forces and extraterrestrial entities. On this trip you will not be limited only to the familiar landscapes of your homeworld - go beyond the threshold of our planet, into the unchartered Dimensions of the Void, find the precious Quasar and successfully leave the Cluster. Be aware your next visits can be different - a random selection of alternative pre-designed game world elements will diversify your adventure in the most unexpected places (randomization works at the first loading of each play session).

DEMO VERSION has limitations of the game world, its content and the duration of the game. It also does not contain a randomization function for the game world - only one pre-designed version of the game world is available in the demo. You will be able to explore about half of the Cluster's territory, as well as part of another dimension. But in the demo version, absolutely all base game mechanics are still available, as in the full version.





Photorealistic textures of the environment, advanced volumetric dynamic lighting with real-time shadows from multiple light sources and detailed simulation of various weather conditions with realistic physical behavior of particle effects create an image of incredible beauty on your screen.. Which you will see through the lens of a bodycam! Not just a cheap and boring fish eye effect like many other games, but a complex and comfortable bodycam controller, specially developed for this game, which greatly fits intense combats and even 3D-platforming. A vision created not just by an artist, but also by a professional certified optician, embodied using the best and proven graphic technologies and realistic camera animations.





Look for dripping springs of clean water and crackling bonfires for cooking. Track wild animals by their footsteps and avoid unwanted enemies. High-quality audio with dozens of independent sources will become your second sight, and sometimes even replace the first one. A completely new level of survival planning in your mind. This is the game where powerful sound card and advanced gaming headphones will dive you into frightening ASMR heavens like never before.





The unique Screen Space Suffering system, designed specifically to enhance the atmosphere of bodycam simulation, will allow you to feel every hit, every bullet and every drop of blood you lose (you will literally spurt it onto the surrounding space when you start bleeding).





Gather precious Delta Energy by getting the Pulsars from twisted zones of harmful interdimensional radiation to power your gear's special abilities, including anti-gravitational jumps, sprint boosts, air dashes, and even slowing down the time itself! Change the rules of classic horror game and turn yourself from a fragile victim into a deadliest hunter.





Explore the maddening Limirinths - ever-changing liminal spaces warped by Delta radiation that contain a myriad of dangers and a unique reward - a powerful Liminar at the heart of the Limirinth that will increase your Delta Abilities (Only one pre-designed variation of the Limirinth are available in Demo).





Make your own bodycam trip into a large and highly detailed hostile open world created with the mix of hand-crafted locations, randomization and procedural landscape pre-generation (Only one pre-designed variation of the game world are available in Demo). No persistent minimaps or magical compasses - use the position of the sun and the direction of the wind for navigating in wilderness, or pay the price in precious Delta Energy for every look at the markers of known locations with the help of Delta Scan. But not only valuable resources will be your reward for such a difficult exploring - find digital notes and investigate the blood curdling lore of a brand new universe, which designed as a unique cocktail of horror, modern urban mystics, science fiction and post-apocalypse. Each new play session will choose one of the alternative world presets where you can find a separate pieces of the terrifying multiversal knowledge. Spoiler: you are not in safe even when you read.





NO ray tracing, NO high-end system requirements, NO extra trash.. just a superior AAA-like graphics in native resolution with experimental 144 Frames-Per-Second mode* based on the best technologies of Unity engine. And yes, you read previous info correctly - modern game with superior graphics on Unity engine.. It is ACTUALLY REAL!**

(* Experimental 144 FPS mode is works as intended if you have a suitable 144 HZ monitor and equipment and must be manually switched from the in-game menu, but the game is also highly optimized to run at 60 FPS by default on classic monitors)

(** No shit, I swear!)

content_descriptors.notes: Mature content. Blood and gore in level design, bloody bullet hits, enemies explode with blood and meat after death, realistic sounds of blood and injuring.

movies.name: Void Stealer Bodycam Horror Gameplay Trailer

name: Void Stealer Bodycam Horror Demo

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 (64-bit version)
  • Processor: Intel Core i3-9100F or better
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1650 4GB or better
  • Storage: 15 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 (64-bit version)
  • Processor: Intel Core i3-10100F or better
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1650 4GB or better
  • Storage: 15 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: 144 HZ Monitor and more powerful hardware are requires for experimental 144 FPS mode, but for default 60 FPS mode in native 1080p this hardware requirements would be enough

short_description: Survive the hostile wilderness of the Cluster in a ferocious bodycam trip to find the source of a mysterious Delta radiation. Use its power to turn yourself into the deadliest hunter and knock the shit out of the most horrifying beings of the multiverse.
supported_languages:
English*, Russian
*languages with full audio support
